President Bush . He served as Defense secretary and chief of staff to Gerald Ford and again led the Pentagon during the second President Bush presidency. Donald Rumsfeld was unapologetic about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the Barack Obama Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said. As in his book, Donald Rumsfeld was forthcoming with his criticism of public figures, including his fellow President Bush Cabinet members.
